articles.title: Starting OKRs with an ‘Imperfect’ Pilot
articles.description: Elena Zhukova, an OKR coach, guided Techramps, a designer and builder of skateparks, in starting with OKRs. Her approach helped the team focus on strategic goals and achieve early wins, using agile transformation to help them achieve their Objective.

articles.title: Bridging Strategy and Impact with OKRs
articles.description: Discover how nonprofit Elemental Excelerator uses OKRs (Objectives and Key Results) to invest in climate technology and social impact. Learn how they align OKRs with their 5-year plan, and remain flexible on the way to achieving ambitious goals.

articles.title: Using OKRs to Make Your Organization More Diverse, Equitable, and Inclusive
articles.description: Learn ways OKRs help you achieve your diversity goals. Explore these OKR examples for DEI to build an inclusive culture.

articles.title: Creating Synergy between Roles and Goals
articles.description: Explore how HumanFirst, a pioneering SaaS startup, leverages OKRs (Objectives and Key Results) to revolutionize clinical trials and pharmaceutical technology. Discover how OKRs, combined with Tours of Duty (TODs), help them drive success through flexibility, alignment, and leadership collaboration in a dynamic healthcare landscape.

articles.title: Juggling Priorities in a Startup
articles.description: Driven by their strategic use of OKR strategies, dive into Mantra Health's remarkable success story. Discover how they transformed the startup through directional alignment, prioritizations and strategic thinking. Learn how Mantra Health refined their existing OKR system and planning to meet their growth needs.

articles.title: A Crucial Turning Point: OKRs in Conversation
articles.description: One crucial conversation ensured OKRs would become an integral part of scaling the capability of a state government team.

articles.title: The First Steps of Implementing OKRs in Nonprofits
articles.description: Discover how nonprofit Emancipet is using OKRs to bring together their pandemic exhausted staff, while also mapping a path to big ambitious goals.

articles.title: Mission Driven Becomes Mission Accomplished with OKRs
articles.description: There are few places where it can feel harder to say 'no' than at a nonprofit. Business Geographer Gracie Koester shares perspective on using OKRs to tackle two common challenges of non-profit teams: prioritization and bringing funders into the conversation for strategic alignment.

articles.title: Setting Common Goals for Impact
articles.description: Every leader struggles to set common goals for their teams. Learn how Executive Director of Ariadne Labs, Asaf Bitton, tackles healthcare by uniting diverse perspectives under one roof: impact.

articles.title: Implementing OKRs Successfully Within an Organization
articles.description: SVP Head of Product at The Knot Worldwide Nikita Miller shares her secrets to motivating teams to use OKRs well within an organization to set and achieve goals.

articles.title: Using OKRs to Scale: A Cautionary Tale
articles.description: Learn how one startup used OKRs (Objectives and Key Results) and still failed. OKRs are not a substitute for strategy. See how Learning OKRs can help set your company up for sustainable success.

articles.title: Empowering Teams to Own Their OKRs
articles.description: For TravelPerk, OKRs provide a '...framework [that] is easy to understand, and gives all teams independence and the flexibility to contribute to the company’s focus without being told what to do.'
